casebody.data:
Akron Bar Association v. Coombs.

[Cite as Akron Bar Assn. v. Coombs (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 1239.]

(No. 98-2656 Submitted and decided April 18, 2000.)

*1240For earlier case, see Akron Bar Assn. v. Coombs (1999), 85 Ohio St.3d 391, 709 N.E.2d 108.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
